trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMJICAVESURVEY_00831_POINT_001_000<tab>Nothing seems particularly suspicious here. Maybe you'll have better luck at another location.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVESURVEY_00831_POINT_001_005<tab>You hear the chittering of an animal reverberating beyond the rock wall. Perhaps it signifies a secret cavern? Regardless, the felicitous furball will want to know of your findings.
TEXT_CTSMJICAVESURVEY_00831_POINT_001_010<tab>Nothing seems particularly suspicious here. Maybe you'll have better luck at another location.

TEXT_CTSMJICAVESURVEY_00831_POINT_001_015<tab>Rapping your knuckles against the rock wall yields a hollow sound. Perhaps a secret cavern lies beyond? The determined digger will undoubtedly wish to hear of this.
